Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2008 11:49AM nack35 wrote:    I had one node taken out..dr. said all the others were clear..yipppe. but this one the dye  did not go inhto it. Was blocked. Not sure why. so he took that node out and I have one drain. I put a bra on,but it felt tight and I was afraid it would squeeze the drain tube and it would not drain right.  So I am only wearing a camosole. is that ok? I don't need the support of a bra? I have a incision under my arm that hurts worse then  the 1st surgery did. So is the cami ok? I have drain pinned to the bottom of it....... Thanks, Nancy
